title: Kled Voice Questions
body:
so i played this marvelous bastard on the public beta, i love his voice, and i have a few question about it.
for those who haven't heard it yet here it is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QsCTnM9m5eM
now the questions
1: Who did the voice for him? also i feel sorry for his throat
2: What made you decide to add so much swearing?
3: at any point, did he drop more F/S- bombs?

replies.body:
1. As a general rule, riot does not give out the names of the voice actor, until that voice actor has alteady taken credit for their work. (Bunch of legalish reasons for this)

2. Kled is an emotional guy.  He has feels and no filter.   Also...  It was funny.

3. Nope 99% of the lines cut were cut because they were too violent.    And actually "Holy Sh*t"where are we?!?"  Was only bleeped cause we tested it and saw it did make the line funnier. (I suggested we try beeping a couple lines in the script)

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hPn46yZQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T03:55:30.675+0000)
>
> 1. As a general rule, riot does not give out the names of the voice actor, until that voice actor has alteady taken credit for their work. (Bunch of legalish reasons for this)
> 
> 2. Kled is an emotional guy.  He has feels and no filter.   Also...  It was funny.
> 
> 3. Nope 99% of the lines cut were cut because they were too violent.    And actually "Holy Sh*t"where are we?!?"  Was only bleeped cause we tested it and saw it did make the line funnier. (I suggested we try beeping a couple lines in the script)

He sounds like the same voice actor for Twitch.
I think he is the same guy who plays Lubert on iCarly xD
I love the southern accent on kled, also meaning I can replicate it very well XD

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hPn46yZQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T03:55:30.675+0000)
>
> 1. As a general rule, riot does not give out the names of the voice actor, until that voice actor has alteady taken credit for their work. (Bunch of legalish reasons for this)
> 
> 2. Kled is an emotional guy.  He has feels and no filter.   Also...  It was funny.
> 
> 3. Nope 99% of the lines cut were cut because they were too violent.    And actually "Holy Sh*t"where are we?!?"  Was only bleeped cause we tested it and saw it did make the line funnier. (I suggested we try beeping a couple lines in the script)

Incorrect, Riot Gypsey gave out the info that Quinton Flynn voiced Jhin on the Q&A before Quinton had announced it himself
Which champs does he have quotes for?

Lots and lots of them.

He has taunts and "on.enemy.champion.kill lines.

Not sure, maybe not as many as Dunkmaster --but in that area I think.

don't want to break that rule either, i'm absolutely NOT sure about this but i think i picked up somewhere (can't remember where) that Spike Spencer did the voice acting for kled.... DON'T take my word for it!
I love the fact that he has the one quote where he just shouts "serenity now" as a reference to seinfeld

Idk why but the voice and the physic reminds me a bit of Sir Didymus in the old labyrinth movie but with more hate in his sentences. (http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/labyrinth/images/f/fc/1253403034_6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111005181009)

Hope I'm not breaking rule 1 here, but he sounds A LOT like Pat Buttram.

AKA the Sheriff of Nottingham, from Disney's Robin Hood, only, pitched up a bit with some more bass. :p
Pat Buttram is no longer alive, so I'm pretty sure it's not him. Good try though, you were only off by 22 years.
